descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a gray grid with random color cubes
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...stay the same
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...find space in grid that only have 4 colored cubes. Copy this small grid, but on the big grid, fill the entire 9x9 block with the cube colors and make the other colored cubes black, except the gray.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a gray grid with 9 different smaller squares with various color block patterns.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...remains the same.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...find the square that has only four color blocks in the pattern. Use that design to fill the blocks in the output design. The gray areas stay the same.
